snippet: Close to half of the members of Fix the Debt’s board and steering committee have ties to companies that have engaged in lobbying on taxes and spending.
abstract: Fix the Debt, group of business executives and onetime legislators, are Washington's most visible and best-financed advocates for reining in the federal deficit; close to half the members of Fix the Debt's board and steering committee have ties to companies that have engaged in lobbying on taxes and spending.
lead_paragraph: Close to half of the members of Fix the Debt’s board and steering committee have ties to companies that have engaged in lobbying on taxes and spending.

headline.seo: Campaign to Cut Deficit Has Deep Business
headline.main: Public Goals, Private Interests in Debt Campaign
headline.print_headline: Public Goals, Private Interests in Debt Campaign
